channel.title: Reconnaissance on D0CUM3NTN4T10N

item.title: Passive Reconnaissance
item.description: Identifing Our Target linkNeed to identify What’s within the SCOPE and What’s not. Example: https://bugcrowd.com/tesla Discovering Email Addresses linkHunter.io linkhunter.io also can identify the pattern of the email address. In this case it is {f}{last}@tesla.com which means {fist name initial}{last name}@tesla.com If I had an account created, I can see alot more information about the email addresses of the target. Phonebook.cz link Clearbit linkThis is also a fantastic Chrome Extension that allows me to discover email addresses with some other cool details that other tools did not find.
